title: Avery, MacCleod, and McCarty, 5 answer options 3

content.question: What was the purpose of treating the extract with DNAse in Procedure III ?

choices.label: To remove the encapsulated bacteria from the extract
To serve as a positive control by demonstrating that a protein in the extract is the transforming factor
To serve as a negative control by demonstrating that transformation does not occur without DNA
To destroy enzymes in the extract
To destroy any capsules that might be in the extract

content.answer: To serve as a negative control by demonstrating that transformation does not occur without DNA
